description: A 20-round box magazine, for use with handguns chambering the proprietary 5.7x28mm cartridge.

variants.description: A standard-capacity magazine for use with the FN Five-seveN.

//: length 5 in, width 0.832 in, height 1.75 in, raw 119.3 ml, trim: 0%
//2: calculating the weight of this magazine has proven to be extremely-difficult, in large part due to even the manufacturer of the magazine/firearm being vague and uncertain about the overall weight of the pistol; seemingly the same model of Five-seveN is being listed as either 21 oz or 23 oz on the same website (on page and in sell sheet, respectively); even independent calculations hardly make sense, with some of them suggesting the magazine weighs as little as 7 g; we use the more-precise weight stated in an owner's manual (without magazine, 1.36 lbs) and a French store (with empty magazine, 1.46 lbs) to calculate the weight

//: Audited with IRL measuring of OEM mag, no displacement test.
description: A factory issue translucent polymer box magazine that fits with the frame of the FN P90.

//: Audited with ImageJ, weight is comparative with Fn57.
description: A standard capacity 20-round 5.7x28mm magazine for use with the Ruger-57.

//: Magazine is almost identical to 20 round.
description: A small capacity 10-round magazine for use with the Ruger-57, developed for use in states in which standard capacity magazines are prohibited.
